mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM EMP ) RESULT WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , EMP_CD , EMP_PARENT_CD , DEPT_CD , GET_DEPT_LEVEL_NAME(DEPT_CD, #{langCd}) AS DEPT_NAME , POSITION_CD , GET_POSITION_NAME(POSITION_CD, #{langCd}) AS POSITION_NAME , SELECT_LANG_CD , EMP_ID , EMP_PW , GET_EMP_NAME(EMP_CD, #{langCd}) AS EMP_NAME , ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , ZIP_CD , TEL , PHONE , ID_NUM , BIRTH_DAY , MAIL , ZALO_ID , TRANSLATION_YN , ADMIN_YN , GUBUN , STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(ENTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ENTER_DATE , MEMO , USE_YN FROM EMP, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) TEMP ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit} ) RESULT WHERE 1=1

SELECT EMP_CD , EMP_PARENT_CD , DEPT_CD , GET_DEPT_LEVEL_NAME(DEPT_CD, #{langCd}) AS DEPT_NAME , POSITION_CD , GET_POSITION_NAME(POSITION_CD, #{langCd}) AS POSITION_NAME , EMP_ID , EMP_PW , GET_EMP_NAME(EMP_CD, #{langCd}) AS EMP_NAME , ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , ZIP_CD , TEL , PHONE , ID_NUM , BIRTH_DAY , MAIL , ZALO_ID , TRANSLATION_YN , ADMIN_YN , GUBUN , STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(ENTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ENTER_DATE , MEMO , USE_YN FROM EMP WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}
